amendment.description: To call on the people of the United States to observe National Airborne Day with appropriate programs, ceremonies, and activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4739 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4739 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hagel. (consideration: CR S8409; text: CR S8409) To call on the people of the United States to observe National Airborne Day with appropriate programs, ceremonies, and activities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4739 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hagel.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4739 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
